name: BOSS FIGHT! ultimate saturday night billionaire skirmish
name_original: BOSS FIGHT! ultimate saturday night billionaire skirmish
description:
Now you are the boss! 

What could be better than a good old fight with your friend? Play together on one computer so if you lose you'll show who is the boss in real life!

Controls:

  • Player 1 Move - WAD
  • Player 1 Punch - Space
  • Player 2 Move - Arrows
  • Player 2 Punch - Enter

Check our special attacks

TAXMAN ATTACK!

  • Player 1 Special Attack - Q
  • Player 2 Special Attack - Del

LAWYER ATTACK!

  • Player 1 Special Attack - E
  • Player 2 Special Attack - End

How to play:

Beat the enemy billionaire until you knock out of him all money.
